modName: Space Wiking Original Invisibility Spell Fix
summary: Repairs the not working invisibility spell hand special effect. This is NOT a alternative spell effect, this is the ORIGINAL Invisibility spell.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Dovahkiins

To be clear, this will not replace the invisibility spell special effect with an other, this is the original real working invisibility spell hand effect.
I began with modding only a week ago and it took me only few minutes to repair the not working invisibility related nif file, ahh come on Bethesda.

To install this patch just extract the content of the 7z file to your Skyrim directory or you can use the Nexus mod manager. There is no esp file, so you don\'t need to activate anything in the Skyrim Launcher.

If you want to get rid of the eye glitch too, try my other mod The Glitch Removal Tool:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15135

Wish much fun and greetings from Slovakia :D
Tom (Space Wiking)
author: SpaceWiking
